projects.name: Portfolio
projects.oneLineDescription: Current portfolio showcasing skills with various technologies.
projects.description: This personal portfolio highlights various projects and demonstrates skills with modern technologies. Built using React, Vite, CSS, SCSS, Tailwind, TSParticle, and MatterJS, it showcases a range of abilities and design approaches in a professional and polished manner.

projects.name: Quiz App
projects.oneLineDescription: App for personalized quizzes with HTML, CSS, and JS.
projects.description: This quiz application offers users the ability to take personalized quizzes. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it provides an engaging and interactive experience for users seeking to test their knowledge.

projects.name: Typing Test Game
projects.oneLineDescription: Game to calculate WPM and CPM with React and Tailwind.
projects.description: A typing test game designed to measure words per minute (WPM) and characters per minute (CPM). It highlights correct and incorrect characters in the text input, built using React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS for a responsive and interactive user experience.

projects.name: Signature App
projects.oneLineDescription: Canvas app for drawing and saving signatures.
projects.description: This application allows users to draw and save signatures on an HTML canvas. It includes features for changing background color, pen color, and pen width, as well as options to clear the canvas and download the signature as an image.

projects.name: Text to Funny Lang
projects.oneLineDescription: Convert normal text to various funny languages using React and an API.
projects.description: This React application converts normal text into various humorous languages using an external API. It features a playful interface designed with Tailwind CSS for a dynamic user experience.

projects.name: Weather WebApp
projects.oneLineDescription: Search weather for different places with React and OpenWeatherMap API.
projects.description: This weather application enables users to search for and view weather information for various locations. It is built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, integrating the OpenWeatherMap API to deliver real-time weather updates.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.oneLineDescription: A simple calculator built with HTML, CSS, and JS.
projects.description: A straightforward calculator application created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features basic arithmetic operations and a clean interface.

projects.name: We Felt (Blog App)
projects.oneLineDescription: Blog app for sharing posts using ReactJS and NodeJS.
projects.description: This blog application allows users to share and read blogs. Built with ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, and ExpressJS, it provides a platform for users to publish their posts and interact with content. This project includes collaboration with others.

projects.name: Hover ATM Card
projects.oneLineDescription: ATM card with hover effect that flips to reveal additional information.
projects.description: An ATM card with a hover effect that flips to reveal additional information, built with HTML and CSS.

projects.name: Navbar Slider in React
projects.oneLineDescription: Navbar functionality with a sliding effect using React and CSS.
projects.description: A project demonstrating how a navbar works with a sliding effect on clicking the menu button. Built with React and CSS, it showcases interactive UI design principles.

projects.name: Filter Products
projects.oneLineDescription: Product filtering functionality using React and Tailwind.
projects.description: An application that allows users to filter products by search or by product types. This project, built with React and Tailwind CSS, demonstrates efficient filtering and searching capabilities.

projects.name: IncDec_reduxNhook
projects.oneLineDescription: Incrementer and decrementer app using Redux and hooks.
projects.description: This project demonstrates an incrementer and decrementer functionality using Redux and React hooks. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it showcases state management and UI design techniques.

projects.name: Hoster Landing Page
projects.oneLineDescription: Landing page template for practice with React and Tailwind.
projects.description: A landing page template created for practice using React and Tailwind CSS. It is designed to demonstrate layout and styling techniques.

projects.name: Login SignUp Page
projects.oneLineDescription: Single-page application for login and signup using HTML, CSS, and JS.
projects.description: A simple single-page application for login and signup functionalities, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It demonstrates basic authentication UI elements.

projects.name: Profile Card
projects.oneLineDescription: Simple profile card template using HTML and CSS.
projects.description: A basic profile card template built with HTML and CSS. It features a clean design for showcasing profile information.

projects.name: ATM Card
projects.oneLineDescription: Basic ATM card design using HTML and CSS.
projects.description: A basic design of an ATM card using HTML and CSS.

projects.name: Tailwind Practice Template
projects.oneLineDescription: Template for practicing positioning with Tailwind CSS.
projects.description: A practice template designed to experiment with positioning and layout using Tailwind CSS and HTML. It serves as a tool for improving design skills.

projects.name: Spotify Clone
projects.oneLineDescription: Clone of Spotify for searching music using HTML, CSS, and Spring Boot.
projects.description: A music search application that mimics Spotify, built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Spring Boot, and PostgreSQL.

projects.name: Non Responsive Portfolio
projects.oneLineDescription: First portfolio project using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
projects.description: An early portfolio project built with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, showcasing basic web design skills.

projects.name: Openheimer Style Portfolio Front Page
projects.oneLineDescription: Portfolio front page inspired by Openheimer poster using HTML and CSS.
projects.description: A portfolio front page inspired by the Openheimer poster, designed with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Old Monk Toyz
projects.oneLineDescription: Information about old cars using HTML, CSS, and JS.
projects.description: A project providing information about old cars, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
